## Summary of changes made:

1. **pom.xml updates:**
   - Updated Spring Boot version from 2.4.1 to 3.2.1
   - Changed Java version from 1.8 to 17
   - Updated Spring Cloud version to 2023.0.0
   - Added dependencyManagement section for Spring Cloud dependencies
   - Removed explicit Spring Cloud dependency versions (now managed by the BOM)
   - Updated maven plugin configurations to use Java 17

2. **Java code updates:**
   - Changed `@EnableEurekaClient` to `@EnableDiscoveryClient` in BuyCycleApplication.java (Spring Boot 3 compatibility)
   - Updated `javax.servlet.*` imports to `jakarta.servlet.*` in XASessionChecker.java (Jakarta EE namespace migration)
   - Updated `javax.annotation.*` imports to `jakarta.annotation.*` in EBestInitialization.java (Jakarta EE namespace migration)
   - Removed `@ConstructorBinding` annotation from EBestConfig.java (no longer needed in Spring Boot 3)

The project now successfully builds and tests pass with Java 17 and all the latest compatible versions of Spring Boot 3.2.1 and Spring Cloud 2023.0.0.
